title: Like A Girl
description: It's wonderful to be "Like A Girl"! In this book you will meet five girls who embrace this phrase in their daily lives as they play, dress, and express their feelings in a variety of ways. Challenging stereotypes and affirming diversity, this book powerfully reclaims the phrase as it shows children that acting “like a girl” is something to celebrate. Rich colourful illustrations accompany this uplifting text make this is the prefect book for all pre- and early reader's - boys and girls!
author: Leslie Perkins
